mapper.select: select p.product_name,p.product_price,p.product_id, d.draw_reqruit, d.draw_event_start_date, d.draw_event_end_date, d.draw_pur_start_date, d.draw_pur_end_date, d.draw_comment,d.draw_id from t_draw as d join t_product as p on d.product_id = p.product_id;

select p.product_name,p.product_price,p.product_id, d.draw_reqruit, d.draw_event_start_date, d.draw_event_end_date, d.draw_pur_start_date, d.draw_pur_end_date, d.draw_comment,d.draw_id from t_draw as d join t_product as p on d.product_id = p.product_id and draw_id=#{no};
select draw_id, draw_title, draw_price, product_id, draw_reqruit, draw_event_start_date, draw_event_end_date, draw_pur_start_date, draw_pur_end_date, draw_comment from t_draw;
select draw_id from t_draw where product_id=#{product_id};
select draw_id,draw_enter_id, member_id, draw_result_regdate,draw_result_winning from t_draw_result where draw_id=#{draw_id} and draw_enter_id=#{draw_enter_id} and member_id=#{member_id};
